title: Star Dust
description: A case of mistaken identity triggers a reign of terror.The night of her Tauri masque, Oriana meets a handsome stranger, but soon finds out he’s not whom she thought. Her innocent mistake sets off a course of action she never would have anticipated. When an unknown enemy attacks, Oriana’s world is all but destroyed forcing her to seek the help of a neighboring kingdom.When Oriana stumbles across his planet, prince Lucian knows he must help her find those responsible, in order to stop the attacks that span the solar system and clear the name of his kingdom.Worlds are conquered, lives torn apart, and destruction reigns, while Oriana unknowingly holds the key to salvation. Now a princess who needs saving, must save herself, the man she loves, and the Universe, before it is destroyed beyond repair.
author: Ali Winters
